# SpiralSafe Document State Marker
# Required for all documentation artifacts

status: active # active | aspirational | historical | archived
coherence_phase: understanding # understanding | knowledge | intention | execution | learning
last_verified: 2026-01-03
last_verified_by: ATOM-VERIFICATION-ID
verification_method: manual # automated | manual | survey

atom_tags:
  - ATOM-DOC-YYYYMMDD-NNN

intent: "Why this document exists and what it accomplishes"

dependencies:
  - document: referenced_doc.md
    relationship: informs # informs | implements | validates | supersedes

verification_checklist:
  - requirement_1: pending
  - requirement_2: pending
